title: Vessel
description: You feel the mystic power in plants, stones and soil.  And you've felt the growing wrath of the Earth Mother as foul things begin to move about.

outcomes.text: When you would spend 1 Stock from your sacred pouch, you may choose instead to

title: Danu's Grasp (+Wisdom)
description: When you call on the world itself to bind a spirit or a perversion of nature, spend 1 stock and roll +Wisdom.

bullets: You avoid or prevent their counterattack
Roots, vines, and earth restrain them

outcomes.text: If this brings them to 0 HP, they are pulled into the earth and bound in rune-etched stone.

title: Spirit Tongue
description: You can speak with natural beasts and spirits of the wild. You can always ask the GM "what spirits are active here?" and get an honest answer.

title: Borrow Power (Requires Spirit Tongue)
description: When a spirit or beast loans you power, ask the GM for one of its tags or moves. Store it in your pouch in place of 1 Stock. When you use the borrowed tag or move, roll +Wisdom

outcomes.text: You do it and can use the power again
You do it, but lose the power

title: Call the Spirits
description: When you perform a short ritual and invoke the spirit(s) of a place or object, spend 1 Stock. The spirit(s) manifest before you and will hear what you have to say. What they do next is up to them.

outcomes.text: When you move through nature with care and patience, you make no sound, leave no trace and can ignore any hindering or treacherous terrain (briars, mire, scree, etc.).
When you spend 1 Stock and mark others, they each gain this benefit so long as the mark remains. 1 Stock can mark a number of individuals up to your level +Intelligence.

title: Lightning Rod
description: When you Defend while touching the ground, you can spend 1 Readiness to intercept a nearby magical attack and redirect it harmlessly into the ground

title: Suck the Poison Out (Requires level 6+ and Healer’s Arts)
description: When you draw a malady from a patient’s body, mind, or soul, spend 1 Stock and roll +Wisdom

outcomes.text: You remove the malady and can safely discard it or store it in your sacred pouch (taking the space of 1 Stock) to study or inflict on another

bullets: Your patient suffers lingering harm or trauma
You suffer some of the malady's effects
It will be harmful and dangerous to discard

title: Healer's Arts
description: When someone Recovers under your care, they recover (extra) HP equal to your Wisdom. If you also spend 1 Stock, they heal an extra 5 HP and their wounds/injuries are stabilized.

title: Nature's Wrath (Requires level 6+ and Danu's Grasp)
description: Danu's Grasp gains the area tag and can affect any creature. A mortal reduced to 0 HP is subdued or killed (your choice) rather than bound in stone.
